readable.title: 2242178517_2325b85e5f
readable.content: A little girl is shoveling snow . A small child dressed all in blue for winter stands holding a red snowshovel with a snow covered mini van behind him . A small child is shoveling snow with an orange shovel . A toddler shovels a snowy driveway with a bright orange shovel . A young child shovels snow .
